introduction: Hello, I'm from Bellomy-Carrigg, Inc., a local marketing research company. I'd like to ask you a few questions.

questions.question: Do you or does any member of your family work for an advertising agency or marketing research company?
What is your age?
questions.condition: CONTINUE ONLY IF AGE 25-35 TERMINATE ALL OTHER.

questions.question: Which of the following products do you presently use?
